description: Ordered set of a + b - c as (a,b,c) runs through all primitive Pythagorean triples with a<b<c.
comments: Also called "excess" of primitive Pythagorean triangles and corresponds to incircle's diameter. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Dec 01 2003
links: D. McCullough, The Height and Excess of Pythagorean Triples
crossrefs: For values ordered by hypotenuse, see A087459.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
